metadata.Title: CVE-2023-41993 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
The issue was addressed with improved checks. This issue is fixed in Safari17, iOS 16.7 and iPadOS 16.7, macOS Sonoma 14. Processing web content maylead to arbitrary code execution. Apple is aware of a report that thisissue may have been actively exploited against versions of iOS before iOS16.7.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-41993` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.42.1-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.1 - 2.42.1-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-6.0 - 2.42.1-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
gir1.2-webkit-6.0 - 2.42.1-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.42.1-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.1 - 2.42.1-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.42.1-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.42.1-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.1-0 - 2.42.1-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-6.0-1 - 2.42.1-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.42.1-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.1-0 - 2.42.1-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
libwebkitgtk-6.0-4 - 2.42.1-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.42.1-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.42.1-0ubuntu0.22.04.1').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
wpewebkit package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
